text:
Hi people! I am Som V Tambe, and upon the suggestion of a few experienced members of this community, I would like to ask would anyone like to review my proposal? I don't mind putting it here completely but I am considering that as the last resort, so if anyone is kind enough to take out a few minutes to review my proposal, it would be great if you could react :thumbsup: to this message. I will DM it to you accordingly :smile:
Edit: It is for the *Differentiable CV* Library project in the *Flux.jl* ecosystem.
